title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: First Amendment Activities
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations     First Amendment Activities                First Amendment Activities       Public Assemblies Demonstration groups of 25 or fewer people are exempt from filing a first amendment permit unless outlined in 36 CFR 2.51. Notification to the superintendent is recommended, but not required. First Amendment activities will not interfere with other permitted demonstrations, special events or park program activities. Read the Code of Federal Regulations (36 CFR 2.51) relating to demonstrations.
